title: Vampire Princess Miyu, Vol. 01
description: In order to preserve the original integrity and the haunting details of the delicate line art, this saga will be printed in a Special Japanese Format Graphic Novel Edition reading from right to left. Follow the adventures of Miyu and her faithful companion Larva as they hunt wandering Shinma and come to terms with their place in the human realm.
author: Narumi Kakinouchi
